title: How is alchemy related to the mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alchemy is the process of Understanding & Mastering the Mind. To gain Mastery of the Mind, it is crucial to gain familiarity with the Laws & Principles guiding Creation throughout the Cosmos. One of the Laws is the Law of Polarity or the Law of Opposites. The Law of Polarity underlies all manifestation; everything manifest has poles, opposites, extremes, etc. Ex: Moon/Sun, Hot/Cold, Light/Darkness On the Mental Plane this principle is also in full effect: Fear/Courage, Hate/Love, Sadness/Joy One opposite can not exist without the other. They are same in kind, different in degree. Gender (Man/Woman) is another extension of this Law. Gender is manifest in everyone & everything. The Masculine & Feminine Principles are always present in whichever living creation.

alchemy splits into a double concept of chemistry. the spiritual art; a divine, secret science of, for instance, the hermetic platform.physical chemistry; concerning things scientific in nature.Paracelsus poetically stated that the art of alchemical transmutation was impossible, unless the alchemist himself was in the process of transformation. most alchemists were very pious, deeply religious and were convinced that the advancement of science was a spiritual contribution. in modern times such piety is often frowned upon, where scientists offer their trade/s in exchange for fortune. the philosopher’s stone in alchemy, in turn the great work, is often interpreted metaphorically.

All of it’s simbology it’s about concious, present, internal experience and it’s processes relate to unconcious ones (from the mind). The stone that is not a stone yet it’s always present in nature, anywhere you look. This will help: Carl Jung - Alchemy Good luck!!
